title: 旧约 - 以赛亚书(Isaiah) - 第 33 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 以赛亚书(Isaiah) -- 第 33 章 ( 本篇共有 66 章 )

lineList.en: Woe to thee that spoilest, and thou wast not spoiled; and dealest treacherously, and they dealt not treacherously with thee! when thou shalt cease to spoil, thou shalt be spoiled; and when thou shalt make an end to deal treacherously, they shall deal treacherously with thee.
lineList.cn: 祸哉，你这毁灭人的，自己倒不被毁灭。行事诡诈的，人倒不以诡诈待你。你毁灭吧休了，自己必被毁灭。你行完了诡诈，人必以诡诈待你。

lineList.en: O LORD, be gracious unto us; we have waited for thee: be thou their arm every morning, our salvation also in the time of trouble.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你施恩于我们。我们等候你。求你每早晨作我们的膀臂。遭难的时候，为我们的拯救。

lineList.en: At the noise of the tumult the people fled; at the lifting up of thyself the nations were scattered.
lineList.cn: 喧囔的响声一发，众民奔逃。你一兴起，列国四散。

lineList.en: And your spoil shall be gathered like the gathering of the caterpiller: as the running to and fro of locusts shall he run upon them.
lineList.cn: 你们所掳的，必被敛尽，好像蚂蚱吃（原文作敛）尽禾稼。人要蹦在其上，好像蝗虫一样。

lineList.en: The LORD is exalted; for he dwelleth on high: he hath filled Zion with judgment and righteousness.
lineList.cn: 耶和华被尊崇，因他居在高处。他以公平公义充满锡安。

lineList.en: And wisdom and knowledge shall be the stability of thy times, and strength of salvation: the fear of the LORD is his treasure.
lineList.cn: 你一生一世必得安稳，有丰盛的救恩，并智慧，和知识。你以敬畏耶和华为至宝。

lineList.en: Behold, their valiant ones shall cry without: the ambassadors of peace shall weep bitterly.
lineList.cn: 看哪，他们的豪杰在外头哀号。求和的使臣，痛痛哭泣。

lineList.en: The highways lie waste, the wayfaring man ceaseth: he hath broken the covenant, he hath despised the cities, he regardeth no man.
lineList.cn: 大路荒凉，行人止息。敌人背约，藐视城邑，不顾人民。

lineList.en: The earth mourneth and languisheth: Lebanon is ashamed and hewn down: Sharon is like a wilderness; and Bashan and Carmel shake off their fruits.
lineList.cn: 地上悲哀衰残。黎巴嫩羞愧枯乾。沙仑像旷野。巴珊和迦密的树林凋残。

lineList.en: Now will I rise, saith the LORD; now will I be exalted; now will I lift up myself.
lineList.cn: 耶和华说，现在我要起来。我要兴起。我要勃然而兴。

lineList.en: Ye shall conceive chaff, ye shall bring forth stubble: your breath, as fire, shall devour you.
lineList.cn: 你们要怀的是糠？？。要生的是碎秸。你们的气就是吞灭自己的火。

lineList.en: And the people shall be as the burnings of lime: as thorns cut up shall they be burned in the fire.
lineList.cn: 列邦必像已烧的石灰，已割的荆棘，在火中焚烧。

lineList.en: Hear, ye that are far off, what I have done; and, ye that are near, acknowledge my might.
lineList.cn: 你们远方的人，当听我所行的，你们近处的人，当承认我的大能。

lineList.en: The sinners in Zion are afraid; fearfulness hath surprised the hypocrites. Who among us shall dwell with the devouring fire? who among us shall dwell with everlasting burnings?
lineList.cn: 锡安中的罪人都惧怕。不敬虔的人被战兢抓住。我们中间谁能与吞灭的火同住。我们中间谁能与永火同住呢。

lineList.en: He that walketh righteously, and speaketh uprightly; he that despiseth the gain of oppressions, that shaketh his hands from holding of bribes, that stoppeth his ears from hearing of blood, and shutteth his eyes from seeing evil;
lineList.cn: 行事公义，说话正直，憎恶欺压的财利，摆手不受贿胳，塞耳不听流血的话，闭眼不看邪恶事的，

lineList.en: He shall dwell on high: his place of defence shall be the munitions of rocks: bread shall be given him; his waters shall be sure.
lineList.cn: 他必居高处。他的保障是磐石的坚垒。他的粮必不缺乏，（原文作赐给）他的水必不断绝。

lineList.en: Thine eyes shall see the king in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.
lineList.cn: 你的眼必见王的荣美，必见辽阔之地。

lineList.en: Thine heart shall meditate terror. Where is the scribe? where is the receiver? where is he that counted the towers?
lineList.cn: 你的心必思想那惊吓的事，自问说，记数目的在那里呢。平贡银的在那里呢。数戍楼的在那里呢。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not see a fierce people, a people of a deeper speech than thou canst perceive; of a stammering tongue, that thou canst not understand.
lineList.cn: 你必不见那强暴的民，就是说话深奥，你不能明白，言语呢喃，你不能懂得的。

lineList.en: Look upon Zion, the city of our solemnities: thine eyes shall see Jerusalem a quiet habitation, a tabernacle that shall not be taken down; not one of the stakes thereof shall ever be removed, neither shall any of the cords thereof be broken.
lineList.cn: 你要看锡安我们守圣节的城。你的眼必见耶路撒冷为安静的居所，为不挪移的帐幕，橛子永不拔出，绳索一根也不折断。

lineList.en: But there the glorious LORD will be unto us a place of broad rivers and streams; wherein shall go no galley with oars, neither shall gallant ship pass thereby.
lineList.cn: 在那里耶和华必显威严与我们同在，当作江河宽阔之地。其中必没有荡桨摇橹的船来往，也没有威武的船经过。

lineList.en: For the LORD is our judge, the LORD is our lawgiver, the LORD is our king; he will save us.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华是审判我们的，耶和华是给我们设律法的，耶和华是我们的王。他必拯救我们。

lineList.en: Thy tacklings are loosed; they could not well strengthen their mast, they could not spread the sail: then is the prey of a great spoil divided; the lame take the prey.
lineList.cn: 你的绳索松开不能栽稳桅杆，也不能扬起篷来，那时许多掳来的物被分了。瘸腿的把掠物夺去了。

lineList.en: And the inhabitant shall not say, I am sick: the people that dwell therein shall be forgiven their iniquity.
lineList.cn: 城内居民必不说，我病了。其中居住的百姓，罪孽都赦免了。
